celina chang

3A Computer Engineering | University of Waterloo

My name is Celina. I am a 3A Computer Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. Currently, I work at TD Lab as a UI/UX Design Co-op. My hobbies include illustration arts, graphic design, PC gaming, 2D/3D animation, and volleyball.

Hit me up at celina.chang16@gmail.com if you want to chat.

about me

Celina Chang

3A Computer Engineering | University of Waterloo

My name is Celina. I am a 3A Computer Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. Currently, I work at TD Lab as a UI/UX Design Co-op. My hobbies include illustration arts, graphic design, PC gaming, 2D/3D animation, and volleyball.

Hit me up at celina.chang16@gmail.com if you want to chat.
